name: Baked Bean Sandwiches
author: Michelle Mullis
summary: This is a great fall or winter dish that is both attractive and appetizing! An old family recipe that has lasted several generations.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can maple cured baked beans
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/4 inch slices
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange the English muffin halves on a baking sheet
Place an equal amount of baked beans on each muffin half
Layer beans with onion, tomato, cheese, and bacon
Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven
Set oven to broil, and continue cooking 1 to 2 minutes, until bacon is crisp
Watch constantly during broiling to make sure bacon does not burn
